messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: School and Sleep conferences
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/24/2003 11:44:23 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... Because she s agreed to come and present the weekend immediately after California s HSC
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/24/2003 11:44:23 PM Eastern Standard Time,
shyrley.williams@... writes:


> Oh? So why does she get to be special?!
> Huh!
>

Because she's agreed to come and present the weekend immediately after
California's HSC (where she's some Bigwig---no sleep there). She'll have a 9
hour drive home. One day's rest. And then get on a plane to come to balmy
South Carolina with a threr hour time change. I owe her. I'm her slave for
the weekend.
~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
